feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for design when Enable Markdown is turned on.
  • Integrate octane in preload.php by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10517
  • Update invoice event when matching on invoice transactions by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10522
  • v5.11.24 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10527

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.23...v5.11.24

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change filtering of scalars prior to validation
  • Minor cleanup for session state
  • Always update designs post self update
  • Refactor for invoice deleted
  • Add getters for line item discounts
  • Fixes for mailable logging
  • Updated dependencies
  • Updated dependencies
  • Updates for bulk emails
  • Fixes for plan features
  • Minor fixes for
    tags in templates
  • Changes for encode/decode of custom templates
  • Update zimbabwe gold
  • Fixes for namespace
  • Expose cg settings
  • Rate limiter bump
  • E-invoicing: Healthchecks & regenerating tokens by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10525
  • fix syntax error preload.php by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10531
  • v5.11.25 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10536

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.24...v5.11.25

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.26
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for purchase order table view in Vendor Portal
  • SMTP port fixes
  • Fixes for invoice query
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10538
  • v5.11.26 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10539

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.25...v5.11.26

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added $swiss_qr_raw
  • Check if VAT number exists on PEPPOL network prior to adding
  • Custom exceptions from client portal
  • Add WST Currency
  • v5.11.27 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10546

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.26...v5.11.27

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for user verification emails by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10548
  • Nordigen custom agreements by @dshoreman in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10526
  • Prevent destructive commands in production by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10551
  • Experimental new Zugferd Engine that handles inclusive/exclusive taxes along with discounts/surcharges (use the env var ZUGFERD_VERSION_TWO=true) to enable
  • Prevent apple signups due to no email address provision
  • Fixes for payment status when viewed from client portal
  • v5.11.28 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10560

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.27...v5.11.28
